Hi, to one litre of water add 2 lemons and one forth teaspoonful of salt. At least get your fasting or post prandial sugar get checked once. Drink at least take 2 lts of this fluid.Recurrent sore throat infections could be seen in diabetes. Try betadine gargles along with decongestants (pseudoephedrine etc) for sore throat. But if frequency of attacks is high, do consult ENT doctor for throat culture examination.Don't play soccer if you feel dehydrated thursday morning.
